import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { LiquidGlassCard, LiquidGlassCardHeader, LiquidGlassCardContent } from "../components/ui/liquid-glass-card"; import { AppleRevealText, BikeBearText } from "../components/BikeBearAnimations"; import { FadeIn, StaggerContainer, StaggerItem, ScaleIn } from "../components/ScrollAnimations"; import { Badge } from "../components/ui/badge"; import { Star, Quote } from "lucide-react"; const Testimonials = () => { const [testimonials, setTestimonials] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchTestimonials(); }, []); const fetchTestimonials = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL}/api/testimonials`); setTestimonials(response.data); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching testimonials:", error); setTestimonials([{ id: 1, name: "Ahmad Rahman", role: "Small Business Owner", company: "Rahman Trading", content: "Netrik Techworks saved my business laptop! Their service was quick, affordable, and professional. The team went above and beyond to recover my important data.", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face", is_featured: true }, { id: 2, name: "Sarah Lee", role: "University Student", company: "Universiti Malaya", content: "Got my laptop serviced for just RM40. The performance improvement was incredible. Great value for money and excellent customer service!", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b47c?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face", is_featured: true }, { id: 3, name: "David Tan", role: "IT Manager", company: "Tech Solutions Sdn Bhd", content: "Professional service and competitive prices. They handled our office laptop upgrades seamlessly and provided excellent after-sales support.", rating: 5, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face", is_featured: false }]); setLoading(false); } }; const renderStars = (rating) => { return Array.from({ length: 5 }, (_, i) => ()); }; if (loading) { return (
); } const featuredTestimonials = testimonials.filter(t => t.is_featured).slice(0, 3); const regularTestimonials = testimonials.filter(t => !t.is_featured); return (
Client Reviews

What Our Clients Say

Do not just take our word for it. Read what our satisfied customers have to say about our IT services and support.

{featuredTestimonials.length > 0 && (

Featured Reviews

{featuredTestimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{ e.target.src = "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face"; }} />Featured

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.role}{testimonial.company && ({testimonial.company})}

{renderStars(testimonial.rating)}

"{testimonial.content}"

))}
)}{regularTestimonials.length > 0 && (

More Client Reviews

{regularTestimonials.map((testimonial) => (
{ e.target.src = "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face"; }} />

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.role}{testimonial.company && ({testimonial.company})}

{renderStars(testimonial.rating)}

"{testimonial.content}"

))}
)}{testimonials.length === 0 && (

No Testimonials Yet

We are gathering feedback from our amazing clients. Check back soon!

)}
); }; export default Testimonials;
